Join me for the  Southern California Blockchain Conference this week.

I will be doing a fireside chat on Wednesday 3/20 to talk about crypto, RWO, and the future of the internet.

More info:
Thanks  for hosting me at Upfront Summit to talk about Read Write Own, how we invest for the long term, my vision for NFTs, and more -- it was a great conversation.
None of the above should be taken as investment advice or an advertisement for investment services; please see  for more information.

5+ billion people live & work on the internet. Only a handful of companies own & control it.

READ WRITE OWN by @cdixon is a powerful new book about this core technology—a manifesto for reclaiming the internet from Big Tech.

Here are 10 world-disrupting ideas from this…

“Read Write Own by Chris Dixon”

Informative, optimistic, and written with such clarity. This book aims to give us an appreciation for the essence of blockchain technology, provides a vision for a better internet and some promising applications.

12 insights from the book 🧵

Read Write Own is #9 on the New York Times Nonfiction Best Seller list, and #25 on USA Today's Best-selling Booklist (which includes both fiction and nonfiction).

Connie has had a hugely positive impact on a16z. I got the privilege of  working with her for a number of years and learned a lot. She’ll be missed, but I’m excited to see what she does next.12 yrs ago, this brought me to a16z, transforming my life. Along the way:

▫️ I introduced new tech ideas from East to West
▫️ Was promoted to GP, breaking the firm’s rule of no GP promos
▫️ Invested in bold founders

It’s been a great ride, yet it’s time for a new beginning…
